strapiJob.title: Lead Graphic Designer
strapiJob.description: As the Lead Graphic Designer for the department, this person will be responsible for the visual brand of the University of Arkansas Razorback Athletic Department across print, digital, and video platforms, and facilities. They will oversee the development of the visual identity for each of our 19 teams and oversee the assistant graphic designer position. Together, they will work in collaboration with the marketing and communications teams on execution of creative content including all marketing material, social media content, animation, and advertising creative. This role also serves as the lead designer for facility related design projects, working with the Print Shop Specialist on the execution of graphics for our facilities.
